price: Kuma ku tsayar da salla, kuma ku bãyar da zakka. Kuma abin da kuka gabãtar dõmin kanku daga alhẽri, zã ku sãme shi a wurin Allah. Lalle ne Allah, ga abin da kuke aikatãwa Mai gani ne.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُواْ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنۡ خَيۡرٖ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wamā tuqaddimū li-anfusikum min khayrin tajidūhu ʿinda al-lahi inna al-laha bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
